name: Heal Pulse
desc: Blissey continually restores HP as well as the HP of a designated ally for a short time.

name: Pound
desc: Blissey pounds in a designated direction, damaging and slowing enemies hit.

name: Soft Boiled
desc:
Blissey throws an egg to an ally; healing Blissey and the designated ally. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s. 

When learning Soft Boiled and Egg Bomb, gain 2 additional charges for Soft Boiled. Charges are shared between both moves. Base cooldown becomes 5s for both moves and time between using the same move remains a 2s cooldown.

name: Safeguard
desc: Blissey grants both the targeted ally and themself a shield for 3s; purging hindrances and making both immune to hindrances until the shield is removed (3s shield duration).

name: Egg Bomb
desc:
Blissey hurls an egg at a location which explodes; damaging and throwing enemies in the radius for .8s. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s. 

When learning Soft Boiled and Egg Bomb, gain 2 additional charges for Soft Boiled. Charges are shared between both moves. Base cooldown becomes 5s for both moves and time between using the same move remains a 2s cooldown.

fields.title: Level 10
fields.value: Also slows enemies by 40% for 2s after they're thrown.

name: Helping Hand
desc: Blissey greatly improves movement speed and auto attack speed for self and allies by 35% for 3s. During this duration, all of Blissey's auto attacks are boosted. After this bonus expires, Blissey loses any boosted attack that was granted.

fields.title: Level 12
fields.value: Also increases auto attack damage for all those affected by 15%.

name: Bliss Assistance
desc: Blissey dashes to the designated ally to give it an egg; granting that ally a shield and increasing their Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% for 6s. Blissey also intercepts 50% of the damage received by that ally for 6s. While dashing, throw hit enemies into the air for .8s. When reaching the target ally, deal additional damage to all nearby enemies.
